name: DJ Zinc
description: '''Benjamin Pettit''' (born 12 March 1972), known professionally as '''DJ Zinc''', is a British [[DJ]] and [[record producer]]. Zinc first became known for 1995's "Super Sharp Shooter", a [[hip hop music|hip hop]]/[[jungle music|jungle]] fusion, notably one of the pioneering drum & bass anthems of its time. He went on to produce [[drum and bass]], [[breakbeat]] and more recently [[UK garage]] and [[house music|house]].
